an5.50:4.1: Ekaṃ samayaṃ āyasmā nārado pāṭaliputte viharati kukkuṭārāme.
an5.50:4.2: Tena kho pana samayena muṇḍassa rañño bhaddā devī kālaṅkatā hoti piyā manāpā.
an5.50:4.3: So bhaddāya deviyā kālaṅkatāya piyāya manāpāya neva nhāyati na vilimpati na bhattaṃ bhuñjati na kammantaṃ payojeti—
an5.50:4.4: rattindivaṃ bhaddāya deviyā sarīre ajjhomucchito.
an5.50:4.5: Atha kho muṇḍo rājā piyakaṃ kosārakkhaṃ āmantesi:
an5.50:4.6: “tena hi, samma piyaka, bhaddāya deviyā sarīraṃ āyasāya teladoṇiyā pakkhipitvā aññissā āyasāya doṇiyā paṭikujjatha, yathā mayaṃ bhaddāya deviyā sarīraṃ cirataraṃ passeyyāmā”ti.
an5.50:4.7: “Evaṃ, devā”ti kho piyako kosārakkho muṇḍassa rañño paṭissutvā bhaddāya deviyā sarīraṃ āyasāya teladoṇiyā pakkhipitvā aññissā āyasāya doṇiyā paṭikujji.
an5.50:5.2: “imassa kho muṇḍassa rañño bhaddā devī kālaṅkatā piyā manāpā.
an5.50:5.3: So bhaddāya deviyā kālaṅkatāya piyāya manāpāya neva nhāyati na vilimpati na bhattaṃ bhuñjati na kammantaṃ payojeti—
an5.50:5.5: Kaṃ nu kho muṇḍo rājā samaṇaṃ vā brāhmaṇaṃ vā payirupāseyya, yassa dhammaṃ sutvā sokasallaṃ pajaheyyā”ti.
an5.50:6.2: “ayaṃ kho āyasmā nārado pāṭaliputte viharati kukkuṭārāme.
an5.50:6.3: Taṃ kho panāyasmantaṃ nāradaṃ evaṃ kalyāṇo kittisaddo abbhuggato:
an5.50:6.4: ‘paṇḍito viyatto medhāvī bahussuto cittakathī kalyāṇapaṭibhāno vuddho ceva arahā ca’.
an5.50:6.5: Yannūna muṇḍo rājā āyasmantaṃ nāradaṃ payirupāseyya, appeva nāma muṇḍo rājā āyasmato nāradassa dhammaṃ sutvā sokasallaṃ pajaheyyā”ti.
an5.50:7.1: Atha kho piyako kosārakkho yena muṇḍo rājā tenupasaṅkami;
an5.50:7.3: “ayaṃ kho, deva, āyasmā nārado pāṭaliputte viharati kukkuṭārāme.
an5.50:7.4: Taṃ kho panāyasmantaṃ nāradaṃ evaṃ kalyāṇo kittisaddo abbhuggato:
an5.50:7.5: ‘paṇḍito viyatto medhāvī bahussuto cittakathī kalyāṇapaṭibhāno vuddho ceva arahā ca’.
an5.50:7.6: Yadi pana devo āyasmantaṃ nāradaṃ payirupāseyya, appeva nāma devo āyasmato nāradassa dhammaṃ sutvā sokasallaṃ pajaheyyā”ti.
an5.50:7.7: “Tena hi, samma piyaka, āyasmantaṃ nāradaṃ paṭivedehi.
an5.50:7.8: Kathañhi nāma mādiso samaṇaṃ vā brāhmaṇaṃ vā vijite vasantaṃ pubbe appaṭisaṃvidito upasaṅkamitabbaṃ maññeyyā”ti.
an5.50:7.9: “Evaṃ, devā”ti kho piyako kosārakkho muṇḍassa rañño paṭissutvā yenāyasmā nārado tenupasaṅkami;
an5.50:7.10: upasaṅkamitvā āyasmantaṃ nāradaṃ abhivādetvā ekamantaṃ nisīdi.
an5.50:7.11: Ekamantaṃ nisinno kho piyako kosārakkho āyasmantaṃ nāradaṃ etadavoca:
an5.50:8.1: “Imassa, bhante, muṇḍassa rañño bhaddā devī kālaṅkatā piyā manāpā.
an5.50:8.2: So bhaddāya deviyā kālaṅkatāya piyāya manāpāya neva nhāyati na vilimpati na bhattaṃ bhuñjati na kammantaṃ payojeti—
an5.50:8.4: Sādhu, bhante, āyasmā nārado muṇḍassa rañño tathā dhammaṃ desetu yathā muṇḍo rājā āyasmato nāradassa dhammaṃ sutvā sokasallaṃ pajaheyyā”ti.
an5.50:9.1: Atha kho piyako kosārakkho uṭṭhāyāsanā āyasmantaṃ nāradaṃ abhivādetvā padakkhiṇaṃ katvā yena muṇḍo rājā tenupasaṅkami;
an5.50:9.5: “Tena hi, samma piyaka, bhadrāni bhadrāni yānāni yojāpehī”ti.
an5.50:9.6: “Evaṃ, devā”ti kho piyako kosārakkho muṇḍassa rañño paṭissutvā bhadrāni bhadrāni yānāni yojāpetvā muṇḍaṃ rājānaṃ etadavoca:
an5.50:9.7: “yuttāni kho te, deva, bhadrāni bhadrāni yānāni.
an5.50:10.1: Atha kho muṇḍo rājā bhadraṃ yānaṃ abhiruhitvā bhadrehi bhadrehi yānehi yena kukkuṭārāmo tena pāyāsi mahaccā rājānubhāvena āyasmantaṃ nāradaṃ dassanāya.
an5.50:10.2: Yāvatikā yānassa bhūmi yānena gantvā, yānā paccorohitvā pattikova ārāmaṃ pāvisi.
an5.50:10.3: Atha kho muṇḍo rājā yena āyasmā nārado tenupasaṅkami;
an5.50:10.4: upasaṅkamitvā āyasmantaṃ nāradaṃ abhivādetvā ekamantaṃ nisīdi.
an5.50:10.5: Ekamantaṃ nisinnaṃ kho muṇḍaṃ rājānaṃ āyasmā nārado etadavoca:
an5.50:11.1: “Pañcimāni, mahārāja, alabbhanīyāni ṭhānāni samaṇena vā brāhmaṇena vā devena vā mārena vā brahmunā vā kenaci vā lokasmiṃ.
an5.50:11.3: ‘Jarādhammaṃ mā jīrī’ti alabbhanīyaṃ ṭhānaṃ samaṇena vā brāhmaṇena vā devena vā mārena vā brahmunā vā kenaci vā lokasmiṃ.
an5.50:11.4: ‘Byādhidhammaṃ mā byādhīyī’ti … pe … ‘maraṇadhammaṃ mā mīyī’ti … ‘khayadhammaṃ mā khīyī’ti … ‘nassanadhammaṃ mā nassī’ti alabbhanīyaṃ ṭhānaṃ samaṇena vā brāhmaṇena vā devena vā mārena vā brahmunā vā kenaci vā lokasmiṃ.
an5.50:12.2: So jarādhamme jiṇṇe na iti paṭisañcikkhati:
an5.50:12.3: ‘na kho mayhevekassa jarādhammaṃ jīrati, atha kho yāvatā sattānaṃ āgati gati cuti upapatti sabbesaṃ sattānaṃ jarādhammaṃ jīrati.
an5.50:12.4: Ahañceva kho pana jarādhamme jiṇṇe soceyyaṃ kilameyyaṃ parideveyyaṃ, urattāḷiṃ kandeyyaṃ, sammohaṃ āpajjeyyaṃ, bhattampi me nacchādeyya, kāyepi dubbaṇṇiyaṃ okkameyya, kammantāpi nappavatteyyuṃ, amittāpi attamanā assu, mittāpi dummanā assū’ti.
an5.50:12.5: So jarādhamme jiṇṇe socati kilamati paridevati, urattāḷiṃ kandati, sammohaṃ āpajjati.
an5.50:12.7: ‘assutavā puthujjano viddho savisena sokasallena attānaṃyeva paritāpeti’.
an5.50:13.1: Puna caparaṃ, mahārāja, assutavato puthujjanassa byādhidhammaṃ byādhīyati … pe … maraṇadhammaṃ mīyati … khayadhammaṃ khīyati … nassanadhammaṃ nassati.
an5.50:13.2: So nassanadhamme naṭṭhe na iti paṭisañcikkhati:
an5.50:13.3: ‘na kho mayhevekassa nassanadhammaṃ nassati, atha kho yāvatā sattānaṃ āgati gati cuti upapatti sabbesaṃ sattānaṃ nassanadhammaṃ nassati.
an5.50:13.4: Ahañceva kho pana nassanadhamme naṭṭhe soceyyaṃ kilameyyaṃ parideveyyaṃ, urattāḷiṃ kandeyyaṃ, sammohaṃ āpajjeyyaṃ, bhattampi me nacchādeyya, kāyepi dubbaṇṇiyaṃ okkameyya, kammantāpi nappavatteyyuṃ, amittāpi attamanā assu, mittāpi dummanā assū’ti.
an5.50:13.5: So nassanadhamme naṭṭhe socati kilamati paridevati, urattāḷiṃ kandati, sammohaṃ āpajjati.
an5.50:13.7: ‘assutavā puthujjano viddho savisena sokasallena attānaṃyeva paritāpeti’.
an5.50:14.1: Sutavato ca kho, mahārāja, ariyasāvakassa jarādhammaṃ jīrati.
an5.50:14.3: ‘na kho mayhevekassa jarādhammaṃ jīrati, atha kho yāvatā sattānaṃ āgati gati cuti upapatti sabbesaṃ sattānaṃ jarādhammaṃ jīrati.
an5.50:14.4: Ahañceva kho pana jarādhamme jiṇṇe soceyyaṃ kilameyyaṃ parideveyyaṃ, urattāḷiṃ kandeyyaṃ, sammohaṃ āpajjeyyaṃ, bhattampi me nacchādeyya, kāyepi dubbaṇṇiyaṃ okkameyya, kammantāpi nappavatteyyuṃ, amittāpi attamanā assu, mittāpi dummanā assū’ti.
an5.50:14.5: So jarādhamme jiṇṇe na socati na kilamati na paridevati, na urattāḷiṃ kandati, na sammohaṃ āpajjati.
an5.50:14.7: ‘sutavā ariyasāvako abbuhi savisaṃ sokasallaṃ, yena viddho assutavā puthujjano attānaṃyeva paritāpeti.
an5.50:15.1: Puna caparaṃ, mahārāja, sutavato ariyasāvakassa byādhidhammaṃ byādhīyati … pe … maraṇadhammaṃ mīyati … khayadhammaṃ khīyati … nassanadhammaṃ nassati.
an5.50:15.3: ‘na kho mayhevekassa nassanadhammaṃ nassati, atha kho yāvatā sattānaṃ āgati gati cuti upapatti sabbesaṃ sattānaṃ nassanadhammaṃ nassati.
an5.50:15.4: Ahañceva kho pana nassanadhamme naṭṭhe soceyyaṃ kilameyyaṃ parideveyyaṃ, urattāḷiṃ kandeyyaṃ, sammohaṃ āpajjeyyaṃ, bhattampi me nacchādeyya, kāyepi dubbaṇṇiyaṃ okkameyya, kammantāpi nappavatteyyuṃ, amittāpi attamanā assu, mittāpi dummanā assū’ti.
an5.50:15.5: So nassanadhamme naṭṭhe na socati na kilamati na paridevati, na urattāḷiṃ kandati, na sammohaṃ āpajjati.
an5.50:15.7: ‘sutavā ariyasāvako abbuhi savisaṃ sokasallaṃ, yena viddho assutavā puthujjano attānaṃyeva paritāpeti.
an5.50:16.1: Imāni kho, mahārāja, pañca alabbhanīyāni ṭhānāni samaṇena vā brāhmaṇena vā devena vā mārena vā brahmunā vā kenaci vā lokasminti.
an5.50:20.1: * Sace pajāneyya alabbhaneyyo,
an5.50:21.1: Evaṃ vutte, muṇḍo rājā āyasmantaṃ nāradaṃ etadavoca:
an5.50:21.2: “ko nāmo ayaṃ, bhante, dhammapariyāyo”ti?
an5.50:21.4: “Taggha, bhante, sokasallaharaṇo.
an5.50:21.5: Imañhi me, bhante, dhammapariyāyaṃ sutvā sokasallaṃ pahīnan”ti.
an5.50:22.1: Atha kho muṇḍo rājā piyakaṃ kosārakkhaṃ āmantesi:
an5.50:22.2: “tena hi, samma piyaka, bhaddāya deviyā sarīraṃ jhāpetha;
an5.50:22.4: Ajjatagge dāni mayaṃ nhāyissāma ceva vilimpissāma bhattañca bhuñjissāma kammante ca payojessāmā”ti.
